RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the United States Court of Appeals: the United States Court of Appeals

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.the United States Court of Appeals: Court with appellate jurisdiction over decisions of United States District Courts
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.a United States District Court: Trial court where the case against Raul Rafael Arce-Jasso was heard
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Federal Rule of Appellate Procedure 4(b): Rule governing the timing and filing of appeals by the United States Government
